articles.author: Ian Bott, Clive Cookson
articles.title: Europe's boldest space mission to search for life in outer solar system - Financial Times
articles.description: Juice spacecraft’s ambitious 12-year voyage will observe Jupiter and three of its moons
articles.content: European scientists are in the final stages of preparation for one of the most ambitious space projects ever undertaken, launching a 12-year mission to the outer solar system to investigate whether t… [+4767 chars]
